sentences.sentence: They're trying to blacken our name.
sentences.translation: 他们在设法败坏我们的名声。

sentences.sentence: He accused the newspaper of trying to blacken his name.
sentences.translation: 他指责报纸企图败坏他的名声。

sentences.sentence: Don't blacken my name by spreading rumours.
sentences.translation: 别散布谣言败坏我的名声。
